message: Let's be efficient, Bob. Take this offer and we both win big before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, let's be fair. I understand you want a good deal, but my turn now. This is a strong offer considering inflation.
Bob, time is money, literally!  My last offer was generous, this one even factors in the inflation hit. Don't get greedy, let's close this deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money fast. My last offer was very reasonable. Meet me in the middle or this deal is off.
